Row.Text: +1[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food per Age on the Palace and City Halls.
+2[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food per Age in the Capital for every Tech and Civic Mastery completed in an Age.
+2[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food in Settlements for every Settlement under the Settlement Limit.
+10[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food per Age in Settlements with at least 8 Rural Population.
+2[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food in Towns per City. Repeatable.
